text: Located opposite HDB Blk 401 amk Ave 10, tried their lala claypot $9.90 promotion. It is meant for 2 to 4 pax. The soup is surprisingly nice and the lala is fresh. Both charcoal claypot with charcoal grilled Bbq is really nice. I can choose to cook either steamboat or grilled charcoal bbq. They open throughout cny. Booked a table on 2nd Feb for dinner.

Come for the promotion of 9.90(1kg of lala plus a plate of tiger prawns), really a good deal, prawns are fresh, soup are delicious too, lady boss are friendly too. Will come back again. The prawn paste and scallops are good too. üëçüëçüëç
Tried their promo lala pot now. Worth it! Prawns n other foods r fresh w good portions as well as variety. Friendly n attentive service too. Ample parking in e evening. Pls support!üëçüèªüòä

Only the broth is worth mentioning. The meat and other ingredients not up to expectations. And i am not expecting restaurant standards. The charcoal flame is very powerful. Often drying out the soup fast.
Ample parking. Lady boss is very friendly. Lala soup is really thick and delicious. Highly recommended. Oh, the luncheon meat is very good too!
